description: This tee is built for comfort, with thought to the seam design and placement and a soft knit blend of responsibly sourced Merino wool with recycled polyester. Its simple ice axe design on the left chest gives this tee all the ornament it needs while reminding all who see it that they should go far and feel good.
name: Smartwool Merino Sport 150 Ice Axe Descent Graphic Tee - Mens
